data.title: ‘Daredevil by Frank Miller Companion’ Omnibus Includes ‘Born Again’ and ‘Man Without Fear’ Storylines
data.meta_description: The stars of the collection are of course the "Born Again" storyline and the retelling of the origins of Daredevil in the Man Without Fear mini-series.
data.text:
The Daredevil by Frank Miller Companion Omnibus is once again on the shelves at your local comic shop, allowing readers to experience the last Daredevil work from the noted artist/writer.

The Companion Omnibus (previously releases in 2007 and again in 2016) collects The Spectacular Spider-Man #27-28, Daredevil #219 and #226-233, Daredevil: The Man without Fear #1-5, and the Daredevil: Love and War graphic novel.

Along with Miller, the Companion edition also includes work by Bill Mantlo, Denny O’Neil, John Buscema, David Mazzuchelli, Bill Sienkiewicz, John Romita Jr., Frank Springer, Gerry Talaoc, Dennis Janke, and Al Williamson.

The stars of the collection are of course the “Born Again” storyline and the retelling of the origins of Daredevil in the Man Without Fear mini-series. As an added bonus, Miller’s very first work on Daredevil and Spider-Man are also included in the Omnibus.

The fourth edition of the Daredevil by Frank Miller and Klaus Janson Omnibus was released in 2023.

The Daredevil by Frank Miller Companion Omnibus consists of 608 pages for a suggested retail price of $100.00.

Check out the covers by Romita Jr. and Mazzucchelli (comic shop variant) below and stay tuned to Conskipper for all of your Daredevil and vintage comic news.
